name: Mad Guns 🔫
description:
NOTE:Please play the downloadable version ,for some reason particles and other VFX are not being shown in the web version

Shoot your way out of madness

W,A,S,D to move

Left click to shoot

This is an endless game where you play until you die

Kill enemies to get points

Collect the orbs to get more points

Tell me your best scores in the comments

Have FUN, Thank YOU
